Articles.Content: Realy want to see those brand new tutorials and flight planner to finaly take my ships beyond mun and minimus!
I am most excited about the improved graphics and the new Audio, OST and Rocket sounds.
Colonies!
I'm excited about KSP 2 being a new thing !
I'm very excited for the better graphics and the procedural wings !
very exited to see if my pc can run the game!
I am excited for a streamlined physics system that  do not inherit the problems of KSP1.

Looking forward to head for the stars.
I've been working 7-8y to get exoplanets in KSP1, and I'm super excited to finally see support from the basegame.  
Aside from that I'm looking forward to the mod capabilities and what new content people will create.
How many players do you support online?
I am excited to build bigger and more complex craft in KSP2!
I am really excited for all the new parts to tinker with and the interstellar systems to explore.

鲍勃和杰布还在吗？

有武器吗？

[Moderator added translation]

Are Bob and Jeb still around?
Do you have a weapon?

Edited February 23, 2023 by James Kerman
Added Translation
I can't wait to crash my rockets into the moon!
cant wait to tour the kerbol system and get a real appreciation for the beautiful planet work thats been done.

I am very much excited for the new and updated planets as well as the colony system. When I play KSP 1, I always have MKS installed because I really enjoy colonizing rather than just flag and leaving, furthermore, the colonies just look very cool.
Looking forward to a new "kraken effect", a new kraken easter-egg and being able to put a "krakencraft-village" on the moon. Kraken masters loves krakens !
Multiplayer is the feature that I'm looking forward to the most.
Aooop

I'm really excited to see the interstellar system! Not only that, but the new and crazy ideas that the community will have for mods to make this game even better and more insane are things I totally look forward to.
*a comment required for the giveaway*

17 hours ago, Dman979 said:



Hey everyone!
To celebrate the release of Kerbal Space Program 2 Early Access, we are having a giveaway: Three copies of Kerbal Space Program 2 are up for grabs to members of this forum!


To enter, simply comment in this thread with something that you're excited for! (Only one entry will be counted per person. The purpose of this thread is as a giveaway and to share what you are excited for; off-topic complaints or comments about KSP2 should be posted in the appropriate forum location.)
Giveaway ends at 6PM PT Thursday! Countdown is here! The prizes will be given to the winners on launch day.
Good luck!

I'm very excited for the colonies and the interinstellar system because in the first game I had to use mods and the mods confused me a lot
Most excited for the visual upgrade and new content
I'm excited about all the excitement, and of course discovering the mod-ability of the game, and the actual game, of course.

Can't wait for all that intersteller and colonies stuff.Of course,like everyone else.Also,really excited for the new atmospheric effects.This clouds looks really cool.The gameplay will defenitely be much more interesting with them.
Waiting for RSSRO in KSP 2.
